To defend democracy here we have to ensure that most people vote as that the voting system is hard to abuse. Since the postal vote was created it has led to  postal vote fraud which undermines democracy by allowing invisible people to vote. Also I propose that seeming as it is British democracy then we need to ensure that those that vote have the right to in issues that affect them. I propose the change should be:
Ban postal vote in favour of turning up to the hall where the election is being held as this will reduce voting fraud.
Only full British citizens can vote in British elections .
To increase voter turnout all those that do not vote without a sufficient excuse will be fined however there will be a option on the ballot paper to vote for noone.

It is the duty of every British citizen to vote in British elections.
